Body:
"""
        Test that access by operation policy is processed correctly when no
        user groups are provided.
        """
e = engine.KmipEngine()
e.is_allowed = mock.Mock(return_value=True)
result = e._is_allowed_by_operation_policy('test_policy', ['test_user',
    None], 'test_user', enums.ObjectType.SYMMETRIC_KEY, enums.Operation.GET)
e.is_allowed.assert_called_once_with('test_policy', 'test_user', None,
    'test_user', enums.ObjectType.SYMMETRIC_KEY, enums.Operation.GET)
self.assertTrue(result)
